name: Cosmic Viking Passive T3
owner: the Viking Eddie or Viking Invader Eddie character.
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Immune to Stun and Freeze effects, including Silver and Unblockable versions
Take no damage for the first round of battle
Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden Effects from a random enemy and deal random damage to a random enemy based on your and the enemy's MAX HP for every effect removed after each action
Drain 20% of the enemy's Fury every turn at the start of your turn.This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Viking Eddie or Viking Invader Eddie character.
